text: Milk Money is a 1994 American romantic comedy movie. In this movie, Melanie Griffith plays Eve, also called "V". The movie is about three suburban boys who want to see a naked woman. They go into the city to find a prostitute. The movie got negative reviews from critics. It was released on August 31, 1994. Category:1994 romantic comedy movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:1990s English-language movies Category:Movies about prostitution
title: Milk Money
